mapper.select: SELECT COMT_SEQ as "seq", COMT_BOARD_SEQ as "boardSeq", COMT_NAME as "name", COMT_PWD as "password", COMT_CONTENTS as "contents", COMT_DATE as "date", COMT_PARENT_SEQ as "parentSeq" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_COMTS WHERE 1=1 AND COMT_BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND COMT_BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} ORDER BY COMT_DATE LIMIT #{startRow}, #{perPgLine}

SELECT COMT_SEQ as "seq", COMT_BOARD_TYPE as "boardType", COMT_BOARD_SEQ as "boardSeq", COMT_NAME as "name", COMT_PWD as "password", COMT_CONTENTS as "contents", COMT_DATE as "DATE", COMT_PARENT_SEQ as "parentSeq" FROM TB_PTFOLIO_COMTS WHERE COMT_SEQ = #{seq}
